attributes.additional_details: To praise the workers who have worked through this time. For the NHS and Civil jobs who worked during lockdown and to all the other businesses that have managed to continue to serve our country. They deserve a break. A reward for all who have kept the the economy in check and continued to play thier part in keeping our country alive in all ways.
attributes.background: A double bank holiday given back for not having the Easter as a bank holiday due to the lockdown. To be in late 2020 or 2021.

Introduce a 'one off' bank holiday after covid-19 pandemic to boost morale: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513

Move all bank holidays to a time after Coronavirus Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309243

Bank holiday to thank those who helped during the COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364
